name: Talking Kiteboards by Flexifoil
description:
Talking Kiteboards is a super entertaining first-of-a-kind 12-player animated racing game initially developed for PC gaming. Each kiteboard has a unique personality and skill set which can help you win races. Scoop up gold coins during each race and win gold coin prizes for winning or placing. Gold coins can be used to purchase new characters, kites, kiteboards, steering control bars, impact belts, and outfits.

The player uses a kite and a kiteboard, powered by the wind to navigate different racecourses. Single-player mode allows one player to compete against bots and is available offline.

The kiteboards are self-aware and have their own unique personalities which come through in-game.
